overview: A look at LGBT youth in the outskirts of São Paulo, made by two characters, both 19: Edy, cisgender man nursing assistant, homosexual, resident of Capão Redondo (south of São Paulo uptown); and Jasmyn, student, non-binary transsexual, who lives at Edu Chaves park in the north region of the city.
title: Werk it, Bro
